tool_description: This API is a quick way to get data about any product on amazon, including its reviews, offers, and overall description. You can also get search results using this API.
name: Amazon Product Data
title: Amazon Product Data

api_list.name: Get Product Reviews
api_list.description: This endpoint provides all the reviews that a specific product has.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://amazon-product-data4.p.rapidapi.com/products/B09BG841VC/reviews"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "amazon-product-data4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://amazon-product-data4.p.rapidapi.com/products/{productid}/reviews"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "amazon-product-data4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Product Offers

api_list.name: Get Product details
api_list.description: This endpoint provides all the product details, including the price, description and variations.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://amazon-product-data4.p.rapidapi.com/products/B09KJC9KHJ"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "amazon-product-data4.p.rapidapi.com"

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://amazon-product-data4.p.rapidapi.com/products/{productid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "amazon-product-data4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
